content: Attempting to obtain copies of Public Law 501, 81st Congress (H.R. 6825). Subject: “Processing of Recommendations for Awards to Certain Individuals.” It grants full authority and jurisdiction with no restrictions to the USAF for former AAF personnel. Also, the letter dated 19 May 1950 signed by Major General D.C. Strother mentions Joint Army and Air Force Adjustment Regulations (JAAFAR) 1-11-53, dated 20 December 1948. If anyone has knowledge how I may obtain copies, please advise. I have attempted to do so with Representatives of Congress (AZ), to no avail. I entered Google, and Thomas. Seems it occurred so long ago, records do not reveal such. Robert Email address is deleted. All communications must be made through the SEND button on your profile page. This message has been edited. Last edited by: OldArmyLove, Thu 02 April 2009 12:39 PM

title: Seeking copies of Public Law and JAAFAR

content: I see you're in Arizona ... close to Nellis? If so I'd place request w/ base legal. They'll have more access to channels not afforded to the normal Joe off the street.
